column4: I've recently installed the 32-bit version of Ubuntu on my laptop. I have an AMD64 CPU, is there any real advantage to me installing the 64 bit version of Ubuntu?
No huge advantages, no huge disadvantages.  Major cool-factor.
If I'm only really only doing home-use stuff, am I likely to run into any big 32-bit vs. 64-bit compatibility issues?
Just closed-sourced junk programs, like Flash Player
Tomcat_: Java works, as far as I can tell.
I have been using it for 4 years, no issues.
